companions.content: data class Menu(val id: Int, val name: String, val description: String, val price: Double, val image: String, val likes: Int)

<LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
    xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
    android:layout_width="match_parent"
    android:layout_height="match_parent"
    tools:context=".MenuActivity">
    <EditText
        android:id="@+id/menu_name"
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:hint="菜品名称" />
    <EditText
        android:id="@+id/menu_description"
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:hint="菜品描述" />
    <EditText
        android:id="@+id/menu_price"
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:hint="菜品价格" />
    <Button
        android:id="@+id/upload_image"
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:text="上传图片" />
    <Button
        android:id="@+id/like_menu"
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:text="点赞" />
</LinearLayout>

<menu xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android">
    <item
        android:id="@+id/upload_menu"
        android:title="上传菜品" />
    <item
        android:id="@+id/edit_menu"
        android:title="编辑菜品" />
</menu>

<resources>
    <string name="app_name">牛太郎餐厅</string>
    <string name="home_title">欢迎光临牛太郎餐厅</string>
    <string name="main_button_text">上传菜品</string>
</resources>

<LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
    xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
    android:layout_width="match_parent"
    android:layout_height="match_parent"
    tools:context=".MenuDetailsActivity">
    <TextView
        android:id="@+id/menu_name"
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:text="菜品名称" />
    <TextView
        android:id="@+id/menu_description"
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:text="菜品描述" />
    <TextView
        android:id="@+id/menu_price"
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:text="菜品价格" />
    <ImageView
        android:id="@+id/menu_image"
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:src="@drawable/menu_image" />
    <Button
        android:id="@+id/like_menu"
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:text="点赞" />
</LinearLayout>
